Room.Name: Entrance to Drow City
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to a small underground city. A great adamantite gate lies open to the west allowing entrance into the city.

Exit.Description: A huge gate opens to the west allowing entrance into the city.

ExtraDescription.Description: A small hole that looks to have been sealed at one time.
A large adamantite gate with giant spider shaped emblems stands here.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate street going north-south. A large gate lies to the east while a building lies to the west.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going north and west.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. A large house stands to the south.

Room.Name: 3rd House
Room.Description: You stand inside the 3rd house of the city; it is fairly well decorated by drow standards having a few statues, murals and such. A door leads to the south.

Room.Name: Throne Room
Room.Description: The throne room of the 3rd house is about as decorated as the inner courtyard except with a blood covered altar in the center of the room.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north is a large building.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north and east. To the south is an extremely large house.

Room.Name: 2nd House
Room.Description: You stand inside the 2nd house of the city. The room is highly decorated with statues of spiders and murals everywhere.

Room.Name: Throne Room
Room.Description: The throne room of the 2nd house is just a little more decorative than the inner courtyard having an altar in the center of the room.

Room.Name: Main Gate
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to the 1st house of the city. A large gate, almost as big and elegant as the one at the entrance to the city, stands here.

Exit.Description: A large gate lies to the west.

Room.Name: 1st House
Room.Description: You stand in the inner courtyard of the 1st and largest house in the city. The room is extremely large and decorative. Mural and paintings hang on the walls depicting some battles and a spider queen.

Room.Name: Throne Room
Room.Description: The throne room of the 1st house is in one word...awesome. It is so horrifying it is almost beautiful.

Room.Name: Main Chamber
Room.Description: This is the council chamber for the Matron Mother herself. A huge table and chairs surrounding it sits in the center of the room.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north-south and east.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading south. A building is to the west.

Room.Name: Cleric Academy
Room.Description: This is the most lavish of the academies being that it is for the clerics.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north is a giant temple.

Exit.Description: The entrance to the temple of Lloth.

Room.Name: Warrior's Academy
Room.Description: This looks more like a barracks than a school.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Temple of Lloth
Room.Description: The temple is the largest building in the city. Even it's doors are beyond imagination. Inside of the temple entrance, the walls are made of gold and adamantite.

Room.Name: Mage's Academy
Room.Description: The mages academy is fairly well decorated see that the drow prefer magic over physical power greatly.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street going eastward. To the north is a building.

Room.Name: Slave Chamber
Room.Description: The room is in shambles. Straw is strewn all about the room as beds for the unfortunate creatures who have fallen prey to drow imperialism.

Room.Name: City street
Room.Description: You walk along a highly ornate city street leading west and south. To the north is a relatively small house.

Room.Name: 4th house
Room.Description: You stand inside the 4th house of the city. Its inner courtyard is rather dull by drow standards and rather small as well.

Room.Name: Throne Room
Room.Description: The throne room is basically similar to the inner courtyard in regards to decor. there is a small throne behind the altar but that is about it.

Room.Name: Entrance Way
Room.Description: You stand in the entrance way to the temple which opens up to the north into a large hallway going east and west. Small statues of spiders line the entrance way's walls.

Room.Name: Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you. To the north is a obsidian stairway.

Room.Name: Long Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

Room.Name: Long Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you. To the north is a door.

Room.Name: Long Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

Room.Name: Long Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

Room.Name: Long Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you. To the south is a door.

Room.Name: Warrior's Barracks
Room.Description: The room is a complete mess. None of the beds are made, clothes and other items have been left all about the room. Well drow warriors never were known for neatness.

Room.Name: Long Hallway
Room.Description: You are in a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west. As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving away from you.

Room.Name: Grand Stairway
Room.Description: You are standing at the bottom of a giant obsidian and adamantite stairway. The edges are trimmed with gold.

Room.Name: Grand Hallway
Room.Description: You are standing in the middle of a grand hallway. The walls are of the purest adamantite with gold trim. Mosaics line the walls.

Room.Name: Mage's Barracks
Room.Description: The mage's living quarters is rather clean with the exception of a few used component containers. It is rather well decorated as well. Cots line the floor for the mages to sleep on. the only door is to the west.

Room.Name: Grand Hallway
Room.Description: You are walking down a grand hallway, heavily decorated with adamantite and gold. To the north the hall goes down a flight of stairs while a door is too the west.

Room.Name: Cleric's Barracks
Room.Description: The bed chamber is brightly decorated with spider shaped statues, murals and the like. Large beds line the floor making this a comfortable room to live in.

Room.Name: Grand Stairway
Room.Description: You are climbing a set of obsidian stairs surrounded by adamantite walls. To the north are a set of large golden doors.

Room.Name: Main Chamber
Room.Description: This is the south side of a large auditorium used for services by the drow priestesses. In the center is a large sacrificial pit and beyond that is an altar.

Room.Name: Eastern side of Chamber
Room.Description: You are on the eastern side of the chamber overlooking the pit. To the east is a door while to the north is an altar.

Room.Name: Sacrificial Pit
Room.Description: A you climb down into the pit thousands of spiders cover you tearing your body to shreds. Lloth thanks you for your sacrifice. You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!

Room.Name: Western side of Chamber
Room.Description: You are on the western side of the main chamber overlooking a sacrificial pit. To the north is an altar.

Room.Name: The Altar
Room.Description: You are standing in front of a highly and freshly bloodstained altar. Engraved on the top of the altar is a giant spider with a human head. Looking down from the altar you see a large sacrificial pit.

Room.Name: Slave Cells
Room.Description: This is the main room to the cell chambers for the slaves to be sacrificed. You notice there are no guards around.

Room.Name: Slave Pen
Room.Description: Rotten meat and breads lie about the floor while shackles hang from the walls. The room wreaks of death. You almost become nauseous and decide to leave the room since you were obviously too late to save the slave.

Room.Name: Dais
Room.Description: You stand upon a dais behind the altar. Above you is a enormous illusion of a female drow turning into a giant spider and back again. There is a door to the west.

Room.Name: The Treasury
Room.Description: This is obviously only a temporary storage place for the collected treasure being rather bare.

Room.Name: Weaponsmaster's Chamber
Room.Description: This one person bedchamber is very elegant. The owner must be held in high to get this kind of treatment.

Room.Name: A Well-Constructed Tunnel
Room.Description: As you approach the tunnel entrance, you notice the sturdy construction of the structure. The tunnel walls are made of carefully placed, rough-hewn stones that fit tightly together, forming a seamless surface. The entrance is arched and wider at the base, with thick stones forming a support structure. The tunnel descends deep into the ground, and as you peer into the darkness, you see the occasional flicker of torchlight illuminating the walls. The air is cool and damp, and the sound of water droplets echoes through the tunnel.

Room.Name: A Well-Constructed Tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel walls are made of carefully placed, rough-hewn stones that fit tightly together, forming a seamless surface. The entrance is arched and wider at the base, with thick stones forming a support structure. The tunnel descends deep into the ground, and as you peer into the darkness, you see the occasional flicker of torchlight illuminating the walls. The air is cool and damp, and the sound of water droplets echoes through the tunnel.

Room.Name: A Well-Constructed Tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel walls are made of carefully placed, rough-hewn stones that fit tightly together, forming a seamless surface. The entrance is arched and wider at the base, with thick stones forming a support structure. The tunnel descends deep into the ground, and as you peer into the darkness, you see the occasional flicker of torchlight illuminating the walls. The air is cool and damp, and the sound of water droplets echoes through the tunnel.

Room.Name: Above the Chasm
Room.Description: The huge chasm stretches endlessly into the depths of the earth, its rugged sides jagged and rough. A narrow walkway has been carved into the rocky walls, winding along the chasm's edge like a perilous ribbon. The walls are steep, the drop into the dark abyss below dizzying. The air is thick and heavy, echoing with the sound of rushing water and the distant rumble of rocks tumbling down into the depths. The chasm seems to go on forever, disappearing into the darkness, and the only way forward is along the narrow walkway clinging to the sides.

Room.Name: Large Knothole in the Abyss
Room.Description: The huge chasm stretches endlessly into the depths of the earth, its rugged sides jagged and rough. A narrow walkway has been carved into the rocky walls, winding along the chasm's edge like a perilous ribbon. The walls are steep, the drop into the dark abyss below dizzying. The air is thick and heavy, echoing with the sound of rushing water and the distant rumble of rocks tumbling down into the depths. The chasm seems to go on forever, disappearing into the darkness, and the only way forward is along the narrow walkway clinging to the sides.

Room.Name: Large Knothole in the Abyss
Room.Description: The huge chasm stretches endlessly into the depths of the earth, its rugged sides jagged and rough. A narrow walkway has been carved into the rocky walls, winding along the chasm's edge like a perilous ribbon. The walls are steep, the drop into the dark abyss below dizzying. The air is thick and heavy, echoing with the sound of rushing water and the distant rumble of rocks tumbling down into the depths. The chasm seems to go on forever, disappearing into the darkness, and the only way forward is along the narrow walkway clinging to the sides.

NPC.name: goblin slave
NPC.description: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.
NPC.longDescription: A goblin slave lies here asleep.

NPC.name: drow commoner
NPC.description: I doubt he is the type to give directions.
NPC.longDescription: A drow commoner walks on guard duty.

NPC.name: drow noble warrior
NPC.longDescription: The drow warrior noble stands here guarding his home.

NPC.name: drow noble mage
NPC.description: The mage prepares to cast a spell ... at you!!
NPC.longDescription: The drow mage noble is here protecting his home.

NPC.name: drow priestess
NPC.description: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!
NPC.longDescription: The drow priestess is here shouting orders.

NPC.name: drow master
NPC.description: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.
NPC.longDescription: The drow master stares at you angrily.

NPC.name: drow weapons master
NPC.description: He definitely knows his way around in combat.
NPC.longDescription: The drow weapons master is here shadow boxing.

NPC.name: drow matron mother
NPC.longDescription: The matron mother of the house is standing here.

NPC.name: drow matron mother
NPC.description: She looks like she is about to rip your head off and eat it.
NPC.longDescription: The matron mother of the 1st house is waiting for you.

NPC.name: yochlol
NPC.description: The yochlol is not in a good mood.
NPC.longDescription: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist.

NPC.name: drow guard
NPC.description: The drow guard blends so well with his environment, you barely see his form.
NPC.longDescription: The drow guard is here staring at you ominously.

NPC.name: drow scout
NPC.description: The drow scout blends so well with her environment, you barely see her form.
NPC.longDescription: The drow scout is here sneaking among the shadows.

Item.Name: longsword commoner
Item.LongDescription: A commoner's longsword made of adamantite has been left here.

Item.Name: longsword noble
Item.LongDescription: A drow noble's longsword made of adamantite lies here.

Item.Name: whip snake two-headed
Item.LongDescription: A whip with two snakes heads lies here.

Item.Name: whip snake three-headed
Item.LongDescription: A whip with three snake heads has been left here.

Item.Name: whip snake four-headed
Item.LongDescription: A whip with four snake heads has been left here.

Item.Name: longsword black
Item.LongDescription: A black longsword has been carelessly left here.

Item.Name: whip snake five-headed
Item.LongDescription: A whip with five snake heads is lying here.

Item.Name: whip snake six-headed
Item.LongDescription: A whip with six snake heads has been dropped here.

Item.Name: bracer iron
Item.LongDescription: An iron bracer has been dropped here.

Item.Name: gauntlets iron
Item.LongDescription: A pair of gauntlets has been dropped here.

Item.Name: wand blue silver
Item.LongDescription: A silvery blue wand has been dropped in the dirt.

Item.Name: helmet helm
Item.LongDescription: A small helmet lies up against a rock.

Item.Name: ring ruby
Item.LongDescription: A small ruby ring lies in the dirt.

Item.Name: dagger sacrificial
Item.LongDescription: A dagger with spider leg shaped blades lies on the ground.

Item.Name: hat green
Item.LongDescription: A small bright green hat lies in the dirt.
